description: This schema represents a survey item, i.e., the combination of a question and the list of its possible answers.

answers.description: A list of answers to the question. This list is empty if the question isn't answered, and may have multiple elements if more than one answer is provided.

asked_date_time.description: The date time at which this question was presented to the participant.

answered_date_time.description: The date time at which this answer was provided.
